name: ybank
description: Hi! Are you ready to join our new team working on an innovative and exciting project?  We are looking for a frontend, backend or full-stack developer.  If you are not applying for a full-stack position, let us know and try to solve as much as you can.

scripts.init: cd api && cp .env.example .env && composer install && git clone https://github.com/Laradock/laradock.git && cd laradock && cp env-example .env && docker-compose up -d nginx mysql && docker-compose exec laradock_workspace_1 php artisan migrate --seed && cd ../web && npm install && npm run dev echo navigate to http://localhost/ to see the application running
